title: Battlebunny Rengar- Part 3: The anniversary.
body:
G'day gee-deeians, weebs, furries, 'not' weebs and 'not' furries. 

Today is a very special day to me, for on this day one year ago I created a thread that changed how I felt about League of Legends, something that broke up that ever progressing monotony. Before then, the forums were just a place to kill time- after this thread, I had a mission and it gave me determination. On top of that, I found myself some new friends of which I still speak to today. 

How could one single thread do all this?

Simple. It was an idea, and that idea was fantastic (if I don't say so myself). Something people wanted, something people could get excited over and most importantly, something people could band together over.

Something that has already raised over 1,000 upvotes.
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3887441
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4142236
[until the mods went on a rampage of 'putting threads in their place' :F]

By showing consistent effort to Riot, community ideas become the reality. I really want to thank anyone who supports this concept, past, present or future- you all put a smile on my face.

This game needs more bulge, and not the female kind.

(Picture created by Silverbirch and commissioned by Dusksaur)
